name: Mariner Accident
description: Sci-Fi setting. Kill enemies and takeloot or perks. Influence weapon power, your health, position, time speed and other parameters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Dual Core Processor or better Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 520 MX 512 MB or equivalent Storage: 1024 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Quad Core Processor or better Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT 1030 or better Storage: 1024 MB available space
